Translations.Text: Tamen zhong youxie ren, yu zhenzhu diyue:“Ruguo zhenzhu ba bufen enhui shangci women, women yiding shishe, yiding chengwei shanren.”
Dang ta ba bu fen enhui shangci tamen de shihou, tamen linse, erqie weibei zhengdao
gu zhenzhu shi tamen xinzhong chang huai wei xin, zhidao jian zhu zhi ri, yinwei tamen dui zhenzhu shuangyue, erqie chang sahuang
Nandao tamen bu xiaode zhenzhu shi zhidao tamen de yinqing he mimou, shi shen zhi yiqie youxuan de ma
Xinshi zhong youren kangkai juanxian, youren (yinwei pinqiong) zhi neng chuli, duiyu chaoxiao tamen de wei xinzhe, zhenzhu jiang yi chaoxiao de xingfa baoda tamen, tamen ying shou tong xing

Ni keyi ti tamen qiurao, ye keyi bu ti tamen qiurao. Jishi ni ti tamen qiurao qishi ci, zhenzhu ye bu hui raoshu tamen. Yinwei tamen buxin zhenzhu ji qi shizhe. Zhenzhu shi bu yindao fangsi de minzhong de

Shizhe chuzheng hou, zai houfang de ren yin neng anzuo jiazhong er gaoxing. Tamen bu yuan yi ziji de caichan he shengming wei zhu dao er fendou. Tamen huxiang zhufu shuo:“Nimen buyao zai retian chuzheng.” Ni shuo:“Huo yu de huo shi geng chire de, jiaruo tamen shi mingli de.”
Rang tamen shao xiao xie, duo ku xie, yi baochou tamen de ying mou

Ruguo zhenzhu shi ni zhuan huiqu jian dao tamen zhong de yi huo ren, er tamen yaoqiu ni yunxu tamen chuzheng, ni jiu dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yongyuan buyao tong wo yidao chuzheng, nimen jue buyao tong wo yidao qu zuozhan; nimen chuci que yi xihuan anzuo jiazhong, wang hou, nimen jiu tong liu zai houfang de renmen yiqi anzuo jiazhong ba!”
Ni yongyuan buyao ti tamen zhong yi si de renhe ren juxing bin li, ni buyao qinlin tamen de fenmu, tamen que yi bu xin zhenzhu ji qi shizhe, tamen shi beini de siqu de
Tamen de caichan he zisi buyao shi ni zantan, zhenzhu zhi yuan jie ci zai jinshi chengzhi tamen, tamen jiang zai bu xindao de qingkuang xia siqu

Ruguo jiang shi yi zhang jing shuo:“Nimen yao xinyang zhenzhu, yao tong shizhe yidao fendou”, tamen zhong de fuyu zhe jiu yao xiang ni qingjia, tamen shuo:“Ni rang women yu anzuo jiazhong de ren zai yiqi ba!”
Tamen yuanyi he funumen zai yiqi, tamen de xin yi fengbile, gu tamen bushi mingli de
Dan shizhe he ta de xinshimen, jie ziji de caichan he shengming er fendou; zhe deng ren zheng shi youfu de, zhe deng ren zheng shi chenggong de
Zhenzhu yi wei tamen yubeile xia lin zhu he de leyuan, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong, na zheng shi weida de chenggong
Youmu ren zhong youren tuo gu lai xiang ni qingjia, tamen dui zhenzhu ji qi shizhe sahuang bu ken lai qingjia, tamen zhong bu xindao zhe, jiang zaoshou tongku de xingfa
Shuairuo zhe, haibing zhe, wu lufei zhe,(tamen bu chuzheng) dou wu zui guo, ruguo tamen zhongyu zhenzhu ji qi shizhe. Xingshan de renmen shi wu ke feinan de; zhenzhu shi zhi she de, zhi ci de

Na deng ren yeshi wu ke feinan de, dang tamen lai qingqiu ni yi shengkou gong gei tamen (chuzheng) de shihou, ni shuo:“Wo meiyou shengkou gong gei nimen.” Tamen jiu hui lei er qu, tamen yin wei buneng zi chou lufei er beishang
